figure_1: 1. Ginger; 2. Olives; 3. Parsley; 4. Eucalyptus; 5. Thyme; 6. Mangoes; 7. Apple; 8. Blueberries (one of the many kinds of berries); 9. Kiwis; 10. Cucumbers; 11. Carrots; 12. Broccoli; 13. Chili peppers; 14. Pepper; 15. Peanuts; 16. Cauliflower; 17. Celery; 18. Green tea; 19. Strawberries; 20. Soybeans; 21. Rosemary; 22. Artichokes. Photographs by Karina Carrasco and Leonel Hidalgo.
